title: Tzedakah (justice or charity) box
description: roughly stein-shaped, with handle in back; 3 lion\'s paw feet; male and female figures on front flank a small door with small canopy; lock hangs between figures; railing-fronted \"window\"-coin slots on sides; 3 keys (2 with birds- one silver, one gold and silver key with star); gold padlock
creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
